Linguagem de marcação usada para estrutu: Markup language used to structure web pages.
Linguagem de programação usada para inte: Programming language used for interactivity on the frontend.
Linguagem de script do lado do servidor: Server-side scripting language used to develop web applications.
Framework para construir aplicações móve: Framework for building mobile and web applications with web technologies such as HTML, CSS and JavaScript.
Escola Superior de Tecnologia e Gestão [: Higher School of Technology and Management [IPVC]
O Projeto Roteiros Vianenses encontra-se: O Vianense Routes Project is completed and aimed to be a platform that allows users to explore tourist routes in different locations in the district of Viana do Castelo, as well as provide information on places of possible interest to visit among much more.
Destaques para o arroz de sarrabulho, la: Highlights include sarrabulho rice, lamprey in the Minho style and the famous sweets such as “Berlin Balls”.
Forte presença da indústria naval, têxti: Strong presence of the naval, textile and technology industries. It is also a relevant export center in Northern Portugal.
Viana do Castelo tem uma grande variedad: Viana do Castelo has a wide variety of events and festivals throughout the year. Click below to check the agenda directly on the city page.
Viana do Castelo é um destino gastronómi: Viana do Castelo is a gastronomic destination of excellence. With unique dishes, conventual sweets and local products, each meal is a journey to the heart of Minho tradition.
Com carne de porco e sangue coagulado, s: With pork and coagulated blood, served with rojões.
Bacalhau frito com cebolada rica em azei: Fried cod with onion rich in olive oil, accompanied by sliced fried potatoes.
Polvo assado no forno com azeite, alho e: Baked octopus with olive oil, garlic and smashed potatoes - a classic from Minho.
Carne de porco frita em vinha-d’alhos, s: Fried pork marinated in garlic and wine, served with blood pudding porridge, potatoes, and turnip greens.
Versão local das tradicionais bolas, mui: Local version of the traditional balls, much appreciated in the region.
Doce conventual enrolado com recheio de: Conventual sweet rolled with cream filling.
Rico e doce, tradicional do Minho e popu: Rich and sweet, traditional from Minho and popular in Viana.
Fresco e leve, acompanha na perfeição os: Fresh and light, perfectly accompanies the dishes of the region.
Produzido nas serras vizinhas, ideal par: Produced in the neighboring mountains, ideal for sweets and infusions.
Vista deslumbrante sobre a cidade e o ma: Stunning view of the city and the sea, ideal for a relaxing stay in a historic environment.
Moderno e confortável, com spa e acesso: Modern and comfortable, with spa and direct access to the sea.
Antigo solar restaurado, combina charme: Restored old manor house, combining classic charm with modern comfort.
Hotel boutique com design contemporâneo: Boutique hotel with contemporary design and sophisticated details.
Alojamento confortável com restaurante e: Comfortable accommodation with restaurant and free parking.
Envolto em natureza, ideal para relaxar: Surrounded by nature, ideal for relaxing in a family atmosphere.
Hotel 4 estrelas com piscina interior, s: 4-star hotel with indoor pool, spa and panoramic views.
Panoramic view of the city and sea.
O Santuário do Sagrado Coração de Jesus,: The Sanctuary of the Sacred Heart of Jesus, also known as Santa Luzia, is one of the most beautiful churches in Portugal. Built in the 20th century, it offers one of the best views in the country, accessible by road or funicular.
Hospital ship converted into a museum.
O Navio Gil Eannes serviu como navio hos: The Gil Eannes Ship served as a hospital ship for the cod fleet in the waters of Newfoundland. Today it is anchored in Viana do Castelo and operates as a museum, offering a unique visit to Portuguese maritime history.
Construída em 1589, a Igreja da Misericó: Built in 1589, the Church of Mercy is a jewel of Renaissance and Baroque architecture. Its facade is unique in Portugal, with three floors of arcades on Tuscan and Ionic columns.
Este castelo teve um papel defensivo cru: This castle played a crucial defensive role in protecting the city from maritime invaders. Nowadays it is a historic site overlooking the port and the sea.
Museu com coleção de faiança e mobiliári: Museum with a collection of pottery and furniture.
Instalado num solar do século XVIII, o m: Housed in an 18th century manor house, the museum contains valuable collections of Portuguese pottery, furniture and sacred art. A must-see for art lovers.
Praia ideal para surf e desportos náutic: Beach ideal for surfing and water sports.
A Praia do Cabedelo é famosa pelas ótima: Cabedelo Beach is famous for its great conditions for surfing, windsurfing and kitesurfing. It has golden sands and a relaxed atmosphere, much appreciated by both locals and visitors.
Futebol, Judo, Dança Desportiva, Ténis d: Football, Judo, Sports Dance, Table Tennis, Billiards, etc
Clube histórico fundado em 1898, o mais: Historic club founded in 1898, the oldest in Portugal.
Principalmente conhecido pelo futebol, m: Mainly known for football, but also promotes other modalities such as judo, sports dance, billiards and motorsport.
Clube dedicado ao futebol amador, sediad: Club dedicated to amateur football, based in Vila de Punhe. Participates in regional competitions and is important in the training of young athletes.
Promove o desporto e a inclusão social n: Promotes sport and social inclusion in the community.
Fundado em 2010, aposta na formação desp: Founded in 2010, it focuses on the sports training of young people in various modalities, with a strong presence in regional football.
Futebol, Atletismo, Xadrez, Basquetebol,: Football, Athletics, Chess, Basketball, Cycling, Handball and Fishing
Multidesportivo e com grande tradição lo: Multisport and with great local tradition, it was born with a focus on football and expanded to modalities such as cycling, basketball, fishing and chess.
Clube de referência nacional em hóquei e: National reference club in roller hockey. Known for training and participating in top championships.
Hóquei em patins, esgrima, ginástica, pa: Roller hockey, fencing, gymnastics, skating, trail, triathlon and padel
Promove o ténis e o padel com campos pró: Promotes tennis and padel with its own courts and regular events. It stands out for its work in training and organizing local tournaments.
Tiro Olímpico, Tiro IPSC e Field Targer: Olympic Shooting, IPSC Shooting and Field Target
Fundada em 1925, é o principal clube de: Founded in 1925, it is the main sports shooting club in the region. It organizes official competitions and training sessions for various shooting disciplines.
Dedicado exclusivamente ao basquetebol,: Dedicated exclusively to basketball, with training and senior teams. Encourages the practice of the sport among young people.
Clube vocacionado para a canoagem, com f: Club focused on canoeing, with a strong presence in national competitions. It also works in training and promoting water sports.
Clube especializado em remo, com uma equ: Club specialized in rowing, with a competitive team and regular training. It has a tradition on the Lima River.
Referência no surf, bodyboard e SUP na r: Reference in surf, bodyboard and SUP in the northern region. Organizes events, trains athletes and promotes the connection to the sea.
